text_block_list.text:
I felt a sudden scent of greenery and looked up. Yamanin 
Zephyr appeared as if she was chasing the early summer wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Were you also invited by the white south wind? 
It's such a joyful feeling isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Not really. I have business with Nagi. So, I thought I'd try 
to find the best place to catch this white south wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I'm confusing you again. 
Excuse me, trainer.

[Business with nagi]…Judging from the context, it seems that 
she had no particular plan. I've seen her walking freely 
around the school from time to time.
And there comes―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Zephyr! Please reply if you are here! 
… Ugh… She's not here either…
choice_data_list: Zephyr was here just a moment ago…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Wha!? If I remember correctly… 
You're Ms. Zephyr's trainer aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Can you help me find Ms. Zephyr!? 
I would like to ask her to join the class social gathering…!

Considering the direction Zephyr walked, 
I first looked into the cafeteria, but…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Zephyr? hm… she just was just here a moment ago～. 
She left after saying something about the evening breeze…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Fuu… What a nice breeze.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
This is the place where the best wind blows 
in the school. You can feel the most refreshing 
breeze during this season, this time.

Yes… that's what she said when I first met her. 
Which means she must be at―!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Ah, if you're looking for Ms. Zephyr she's right th―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: She's not there!? That's strange, I just saw her a second ago…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Eh～, how is that possible! Why can't we catch up to her～!?

She was like a drifting wind, we were unable to catch up to her. 
We then looked around on the rooftop and―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Finally found you～～!! I've been looking for you Ms. Zephyr!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, you look like you're in quite a 'blue storm'. 
Is there something I can help you?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
―I'm really sorry about that. 
I should've told you that it's a 'calm wind'.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know where the wind was blowing, so I thought it 
would be better to not cause a storm in the clear sky.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: …huh?

Zephyr's words were hard to understand as usual… 
she uses the word 'calm wind' whenever someone 
asks her about her schedule.

'Plan is a calm wind' meant that she has something 
to do that day. Which means―
choice_data_list: You're not gonna participate in social gathering?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I cannot predict the wind so…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Predict… unable to predict… Oh! Does that mean you're not 
sure about your schedule? or something…?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
I see, you must have training that day. 
Roger that! Thanks for helping me today trainer!
(*pata *pata *pata…)
choice_data_list: If it's about training, we can always reschedule?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
…No. 
I want to stay where the wind blows.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I would love to spend time with everyone. 
But, I want to take care of the lonely 'hikata wind' as well.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The color of the wind changes from time to time. I want to 
leave room for decisions unaffected by the weather vane…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
…I want to be my true self. Future is unpredictable. Will it 
be a down wind or a light breeze? We may never know.
choice_data_list: That's why you didn't make any promise?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yeah. For me… to be as I am.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: The wind is free… and so am I…

'To be your true self, and be free'… She was unable to make 
any promises because of those thoughts. She has a very 
unique sense of value.

What does she mean by 'nature' and 'freedom'? 
As her trainer, I wanted to know.
